name: Imperium Empires
highlight: The world's first AAA GameFi 2.0 space metaverse.
summary: AAA-quality MMORTS space metaverse on Avalanche, built by accomplished game devs with 10+ yrs experience. It revolutionizes blockchain games through high quality graphics and gameplay, well-thought-out tokenomics, team-to-earn guild mechanics and deep DeFi integration.
